TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: Just sit there because I'm an inanimate object. (a flag)
"A flag? I can wave that around when I win the tournament!"
Wanna play hockey?
"Sure, although it might turn out to be a 'train wreck!' Ha ha!"
Hey, look at this! *presses alarm button* *sprinkler turns on*
Nothing for me to do in this situation except SHOW OFF MY PERFECT PHYSICAL SPECIMEN!!!
Here let me fix that
Awkwardly stand on the other side of the elevator and not make eye contact
Do the same as you do.
Reveal myself as the Terminator model 4.
I talk to the people on the elevator and try to make friends with people
Use terminator 4s power.
A kitty in a top hat? Clearly we're gonna go to an opera or a banquet or something equally classy and he can sleep on my lap!
Ask if you are crying or is that a tatoo.
Teleport out of eleavater
Use time warp and point my revolver at slenderman
like that will affect me (Have you watched tribe twelve?)
I ask again "Where are we going?" "When did I get here?"
Pick you up off the floor and throw you out of the elevator/building maiming you. I then produce a live salmon from my backpack and proceed to butcher it and make sushi and offer it to you.

You use a knife to cut sushi? Here, let me teach you how to use your bare fist to accomplish the same thing!

*punches fish*

Edited September 3, 2013 by OrbitusII
improved
Say Hi. The proceed to curl up in the corner.
Uses magic to clear you out of the corner to free up space.
hugs you as a fellow brony
Gets out desert eagle and swings it around and starts yelling with a maniacal face "THE INVASION HAS BEGUN! AGGHHHHGHHGHGHGHHHH!!1!!!!!!1!"
"Relax man. You're acting a bit crazy. Maybe you should take that helmet off and get some fresh air. I suggest you land before you do that, though."
